app.title: Values Card Sort
app.subtitle: Identify and prioritize your personal values

introModal.title: Values Card Sort Exercise
introModal.subtitle: From "Stop Self-Sabotage" by Dr. Judy Ho
introModal.whatIsThis_text: This exercise helps you identify and prioritize your personal values. Values influence our behaviors and decision-making, making it easier to respond to circumstances, opportunities, and challenges with integrity and authenticity.
introModal.howToUse_step1: Sort {{cardCount}} value cards into three columns based on their importance to you
introModal.howToUse_step2: Each column must have exactly {{cardsPerColumn}} cards
introModal.howToUse_step3: Drag cards between columns to organize them
introModal.howToUse_step4: Cards will automatically rebalance to maintain {{cardsPerColumn}} per column
introModal.howToUse_step5: On mobile, tap cards to view their full descriptions
introModal.remember_text: Rank these values based on your current priorities, right now in this moment. There are no right or wrong answers – just be honest with yourself. The goal is to help you make decisions and set goals that align with what truly matters to you.
introModal.quote: "Goals that are firmly rooted in values will be that much more self-sabotage-proof."

footer.text: Based on the Values Card Sort exercise from Stop Self-Sabotage by Dr. Judy Ho
